company_profile.title: GC Pharma GmbH
company_profile.p1: C Pharma is a leading international service and consulting company in the pharmaceutical sector, providing customized service packages for its outsourcing partners. Our clients and partners can benefit from a wide range of services, ranging from the development of active ingredients to development services for pre-formulated drugs, their registration and production, packaging and logistics.
company_profile.p2: Our focus is on providing certified services and products through a customer-tailored process interface, all from a single source, thereby ensuring outstanding quality in every area. Together with our partners, suppliers, and manufacturers, we form a high-performance network that exports medications of the highest European quality, bringing us one step closer to realizing our dream of comprehensive health for all.

corporate_goals.title: Our goals: Health for life.
corporate_goals.p1_strong: At GC Pharma, we have made it our mission to put people, their health, and well-being at the center of our actions. While achieving a state of good health is a relatively easily attainable goal in Europe, many other countries lack adequate medical care to enjoy good health.
corporate_goals.p1_normal: Most of the world's diseases are now treatable with medication, yet a large portion of the world's population still lacks access to these life-saving drugs. This sad reality contradicts the human right to healthcare. Together with our partners and you, our customers, we want to contribute to working on solutions to this global problem.
corporate_goals.left_p1: “Health is a state of complete physical, mental, and social well-being and not merely the absence of disease or infirmity.“
corporate_goals.right_p1: Therefore, our primary task is, on the one hand, to question the status quo of pharmacy with our European partners and customers. This way, we can identify and explore new and better ways in the production and distribution of medicines. With our high-quality products and services, we aim to make an active contribution to a better, healthier society.
corporate_goals.right_p2: We aim to increase the quality of life for all people through prevention, healing, and relief, and we also strive to enable our high-quality standards in the pharmaceutical field to be transferred to other countries. Our calling is to ensure that health is not a privilege but is accessible to every person. With our promise of “Made in Germany,“ we guarantee that research, production, and quality assurance take place in Germany and meet our high German values. This commitment to the highest quality also applies to all of our traded goods.

production.title: Our services at a glance
production.left_p1: Together with our qualified partners in research and production, we can offer you a complete full-service for your products.
production.left_p2: We are happy to assist you in formulating your own active ingredients or generics, advise you on the selection of suitable application forms for your patients, and of course, our partners are also happy to take on the entire production process for you. As the entire manufacturing process can take place in our partners' facilities, depending on the dosage form, in cleanrooms of purity class B (under laminar airflow A in B), with final sterilization by autoclave in the final container, you can rely on the highest pharmaceutical quality and hygiene standards in every respect. In addition to complying with the guidelines of the European Pharmacopoeia and the EU-GMP guidelines (Good Manufacturing Practices), the laboratories comply with numerous national and international standards and regulations that deal with the production process and the necessary facilities.
production.slogan_title: Our experienced experts are happy to advise you on choosing the appropriate application form for your target market and audience.
production.slogan_left: The choice of the drug form to be manufactured is entirely up to you. Our state-of-the-art production facilities allow for the high-quality and efficient production of various drug forms, from solid, orally administered medications such as tablets and capsules to semi-solid or liquid forms such as creams or infusions. We can manufacture all common drug forms in large batches.
production.slogan_right: In case it is not possible for us or our partners to produce the specific dosage form that you require, we would be pleased to connect you with leading manufacturers. This allows you to receive different products from a single source in a short amount of time, react flexibly to the demands of your customers, and always be certain of the optimal quality of your medications.

storage.title:
These are the three important storage facts
 of GC Pharma GmbH

boxes.description: All storage areas are qualified according to the state of the art, are requalified at regular intervals and are equipped with the most modern temperature monitoring systems, which continuously record all data and immediately trigger an alarm in the event of deviations.

When it comes to the safety of our customers' products, only the best is good enough. All company and storage rooms are secured by means of a burglar alarm system with structure-borne noise detectors, door contacts, fire and flood detectors and permanent video surveillance.
When the alarm is triggered, it is either forwarded directly to the 24-hour alarm center (fire, smoke, flood) or directly to the Berlin police (burglary).

advice.title: We at GC Pharma are happy to support and advise you on everything from the manufacture or purchase of medicines to marketing tailored to the target group.
advice.p1_strong: No matter at which point in the development of a drug you want to get started, we have the right offer for you!
advice.p1_normal: The health of the patient is the focus of all pharmaceutical work, in order to ensure this, drugs must meet a wide variety of rules and regulations. We at GC Pharma are actively committed to ensuring that people in other EU countries can also enjoy the high standards of our medicines. That is why we have included experts for the various import regulations of individual countries, especially those in the Middle East and North Africa, in our team. Talk to us, we look forward to advising you! The pharmaceutical and entrepreneurial experience of our experts at GC Pharma ensures that we always develop tailor-made concepts that actively advance you as a company and offer your patients the best possible quality and care. A team of IT management specialists, legal experts specializing in drug and corporate law, and marketing consultants is always at our side for this purpose.

Our employees are always the most important thing in our company, and not just because of their cleverness. What distinguishes the people at GC Pharma GmbH is an inimitable mixture of intuition, joy and enthusiasm.

content.title: WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT:
detail: You are a technically competent contact person and coach for your team (8 employees)
You support your team and are also largely responsible for operational tasks, e.g. for products, content and projects
You will coordinate an external network of editors and authors made up of experts, thereby ensuring that our specialist content is up-to-date and relevant to practice
You analyze and prioritize market and customer requirements, develop ideas for new formats or initiatives together with the team, e.g. in the area of legal tech, and drive their implementation
You evaluate legal developments in labor and personnel law in public administration and their implications for our business and implement them together with your team

content.title: WHAT YOU BRING WITH YOU:
detail: You have practical experience in leading a team and promote appreciative and open interaction within the team and beyond team boundaries
You are a lawyer or have successfully completed a comparable degree with a focus on labor law and have initial experience in the areas of TVöD or TV-L
As a pioneer in digitization, we are looking for someone who likes to think about complex legal issues in terms of new digital solutions
You have strong communication skills and enjoy working with different disciplines and stakeholders

content.title: WE OFFER YOU:
content.subtitle: You can find an insight into our product portfolio here: GC Pharma Capital company profile. At GC Pharma Capital GmbH we believe that we can work best exactly where we feel most comfortable. That's why we offer you a hybrid working model with flexible working hours that combines the advantages of mobile, location-independent work and personal exchange on site. You can also expect the following:
detail: Extensive benefits from events to sports and health offers to a healthy work-life balance
Wide range of seminars and e-learning courses from the GC Pharma Academy as well as many other learning and development opportunities
A culture characterized by responsibility, freedom and working together as equals
Modern technical equipment and attractive workplace design
